name: CITY OF RIVIERA BEACH FLORIDA
sampleDescriptions: Seeking to maintain tax free municipal bonds.  Support for Market Place Fairness Act.
Seeking assistance to address necessary repairs to Stonybrook section 8 apartment project.

Seeking federal funding in the Fiscal Year 2018 and 2019 Transportation and Housing and Urban Development Appropriations Bills for roadway and transit programs; and for the Community Development Block
Seeking to delay or modify implementation of proposed waters of the U.S. rule.
Seeking support and adequate disaster funding and reimbursement for response to Hurricane Irma.
